bibl.title: Some Egyptian Tax-Payers in Early Roman Thebes.
Studies in Memory of Zbigniew Borkowski
bibl.author: CLARYSSE, Willy

bibl.note: S.B. I, 1668; 2464; 4328-4330; 4332; 4333; 4343; 4345-4347. - 1. The Name of the Tax-Payer. - 2. The Patronymic of the Tax-Payer. - 3. Chemtsneus Son of Pelilis in Demotic Texts. - 4. The Family of Chemtsneus. - 5. The Family of Porousis. - 6. Conclusion?
